badge.description: Badge text to display next to the title

barHeight.description: Height of the bar in pixels

data.description: Array of data items to display in the stacked bar

showLegend.description: Whether to show the legend below the chart

showLegendValues.description: Whether to show percentage values in the legend

title.description: Title to display above the chart

width.description: Width of the chart - accepts any CSS width value (e.g., "100%", "20vw", "300px", or number for pixels)
